sections.summary: detail-oriented quality control analyst well-versed in qualitative and quantitative analysis techniques. strengths include multitasking, organizing data and prioritizing tasks. offering 5 years' experience in medical device settings. highlights organizing and recording data into microsoft word and excel detail oriented blueprints equipment operation gmp glp operations leadership iso acknowledgment of customer needs lean manufacturing strong analytical mind mechanical assembly analysis and reporting testing products cross-functional training quality inspection attention to detail, inspection, excel, reporting sop blueprints, inspect, office, sales troubleshooting calibration, iso, word, sop validation conflict resolution, laser, microsoft word, troubleshooting leadership ability detail oriented, leadership, communicator, validation development and training equipment operation, lean manufacturing, organizing strong communicator functional, managing, testing products ability to work independently gmp, materials, quality understanding of office operations glp, mechanical, read clinical support inspecting, clinical support, recording ability to train volunteers ability to coordinate experience in conflict resolution test data summarization deliverables oversight
